operations.description: Reads Virtual Machine Metric Definitions
operations.name: Microsoft.VMwareCloudSimple/virtualMachines/providers/Microsoft.Insights/metricDefinitions/read

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Average disk throughput due to read operations over the sample period.
metricSpecifications.name: DiskReadBytesPerSecond

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Average disk throughput due to write operations over the sample period.
metricSpecifications.name: DiskWriteBytesPerSecond

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total disk throughput due to read operations over the sample period.
metricSpecifications.name: Disk Read Bytes

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total disk throughput due to write operations over the sample period.
metricSpecifications.name: Disk Write Bytes

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of IO read operations in the previous sample period. Note that these operations may be variable sized.
metricSpecifications.name: DiskReadOperations

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of IO write operations in the previous sample period. Note that these operations may be variable sized.
metricSpecifications.name: DiskWriteOperations

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average number of IO read operations in the previous sample period. Note that these operations may be variable sized.
metricSpecifications.name: Disk Read Operations/Sec

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average number of IO write operations in the previous sample period. Note that these operations may be variable sized.
metricSpecifications.name: Disk Write Operations/Sec

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total read latency. The sum of the device and kernel read latencies.
metricSpecifications.name: DiskReadLatency

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total write latency. The sum of the device and kernel write latencies.
metricSpecifications.name: DiskWriteLatency

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Average network throughput for received traffic.
metricSpecifications.name: NetworkInBytesPerSecond

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Average network throughput for transmitted traffic.
metricSpecifications.name: NetworkOutBytesPerSecond

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total network throughput for received traffic.
metricSpecifications.name: Network In

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total network throughput for transmitted traffic.
metricSpecifications.name: Network Out

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The amount of machine memory that is in use by the VM.
metricSpecifications.name: MemoryUsed

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The amount of memory that was granted to the VM by the host. Memory is not granted to the host until it is touched one time and granted memory may be swapped out or ballooned away if the VMkernel needs the memory.
metricSpecifications.name: MemoryGranted

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The amount of memory used by the VM in the past small window of time. This is the "true" number of how much memory the VM currently has need of. Additional, unused memory may be swapped out or ballooned with no impact to the guest's performance.
metricSpecifications.name: MemoryActive

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The CPU utilization. This value is reported with 100% representing all processor cores on the system. As an example, a 2-way VM using 50% of a four-core system is completely using two cores.
metricSpecifications.name: Percentage CPU

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Ready time is the time spend waiting for CPU(s) to become available in the past update interval.
metricSpecifications.name: PercentageCpuReady

operations.description: Gets the diagnostic setting for the resource
operations.name: Microsoft.VMwareCloudSimple/virtualMachines/providers/Microsoft.Insights/diagnosticSettings/read
